text: Maithils (Tirhuta: মৈথিল, Devanagari: मैथिल), also known as Maithili people, are an Indo-Aryan ethno-linguistic group from the Indian subcontinent. They speak the Maithili language as their native language. == Notable people == * Sita – wife of the Hindu figure Ram * Narendra Jha – Bollywood actor * Sriti Jha – Bollywood actor * Udit Narayan – Bollywood playback singer * Bimalendra Nidhi – former Deputy Prime Minister of Nepal * Ram Baran Yadav – former President of Nepal ==References== Notes ==Bibliography== * Category:Ethnic groups in India
title: Maithils
